content:
{"name": "Metropolitan Church of the Nazarene , forgotten harvest mobile pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "*Registration is 7:00am-9:00am with appointment style distribution to follow from 10:00am-11:00am.
Online registration will open at 6pm on the Monday prior to the distribution and close at 5am on the morning of the distribution. If you have not registered online, you will still be required to register in person in order to receive food.
To register online you will need to:
Provide your first and last name
Provide your Forgotten Harvest barcode number (found on your green&white guest services card)
Select the time slot you wish to pick up your food
Provide a valid email address to receive your confirmation and QR code for digital ticketing
This is an optional service. You can still register in person from 7a-9a on the morning of distributions.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.forgottenharvest.org/find-food/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "18945 Frazho Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Roseville", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48066", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4882479, "longitude": -82.9246977}, "phones": [{"number": "(248) 967-1500", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}]}
